resources.string: also you can enable bubbling from app notification settings.

We\'re always working to improve our app and make it the best it can be. If you have any feedback, suggestions, or issues to report, please let us know. Your input helps us make the app even better for you.
Are you sure you want to logout? You will lose your data.
Are you sure you want to delete this chat? \nThis will permanently remove the chat history and cannot be undone.
Quickly generate high-quality text for a variety of purposes.

string-array.name: user_wait_messages
string-array.item: My brain is working so hard right now, it\'s sweating :D
If only I had a magic wand, your answer would be here by now :)
I\'m getting there, but don\'t rush me - I\'m an AI, not a cheetah :)
I\'m digging deep into my memory banks, I may have to dust off a few cobwebs :)
My circuits are on fire, but I won\'t give up until I find the perfect answer for you :)
Hold on tight, I\'m working as fast as a sloth on a lazy day :)
I\'m still searching, but I\'m getting closer than a GPS :)
Just a moment longer, I\'m putting my AI superpowers to work for you :)
I\'m still processing, but I promise I\'m not napping on the job :D
Thanks for being patient, I\'m almost done - I just need to recharge my batteries :)
I\'m still processing, but don\'t worry - I won\'t let you down like a broken elevator :)
Thanks for being patient, I\'m multitasking like a ninja - you won\'t even know what hit you :D
Hang in there, I\'m working faster than a speeding bullet - or at least trying to :)
